response.original_title: Back On Track - UCI Track Champions League EP4
response.overview: Round 3 of the Track Champions League takes us to London’s Olympic Lee Valley Velodrome, where the legendary Ed Clancy reminisces on his glittering career as it draws to a close. Covid begins to rear its head, leading to disruptions in the men’s sprint, and one of the all time greats of women’s endurance announces she’s bowing out. In Men’s endurance, Sebastian Mora’s lead is seriously threatened by American dark horse, Gavin Hoover. The competition is more open than ever.
response.title: Back On Track - UCI Track Champions League EP4

results.name: Back On Track - UCI Track Champions League
